message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $10,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $10,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $7,500 for it.
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $10,000 reflects the true value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $9,000.  This is my final offer for today.
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $7,000 for the product.
